items.title: Bret Taylor’s Sierra raises $350M at a $10B valuation
items.description: Customer service AI agent startup Sierra claims to have hundreds of customers, including SoFi, Ramp, and Brex, among others.

items.title: Rivian makes its second small workforce cut of the year ahead of R2 SUV launch
items.description: The company previously laid off around 140 workers in its manufacturing division in June.

items.title: Facebook is trying to make ‘pokes’ happen again
items.description: The poke-tracking feature is largely designed to appeal to younger users who have grown up with gamification elements built into their social apps, li...

items.title: Stripe enlists a who’s who, including Anthropic, OpenAI, and Paradigm, to build a new blockchain
items.description: Stripe is funding a new blockchain called Tempo to process stablecoins faster. And many big names are joining the effort.

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg sues Mark Zuckerberg
items.description: Mark S. Zuckerberg, an attorney, says that he's losing business because his Facebook business profile keeps getting disabled.
